snippet: Markus Dohle, the chief executive of Random House, promised employees - from top editors to warehouse workers - a $5,000 annual bonus to celebrate a very profitable year, led to by "Fifty Shades of Grey."
abstract: Markus Dohle, the chief executive of Random House, promised employees - from top editors to warehouse workers - a $5,000 annual bonus to celebrate a very profitable year, led to by "Fifty Shades of Grey."

headline.main: At Random House, Employees Will Enjoy 5,000 Shades of Green
headline.print_headline: Cheers for Random House In a ‘Fifty Shades’ Bonus
